titles.title: Personal Pictures Protection Act of 2000
To amend title 18, United States Code, to punish the placing of sexual explicit photographs on the Internet without the permission of the persons photographed.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 10/12/2000--Introduced. Personal Pictures Protection Act of 2000 - Amends the Federal criminal code to set penalties for placing sexually explicit photographs of a person on the Internet, with intent to embarrass or cause emotional distress to that person, without that person's permission.
